description:
This table extracts the ambulance certificate condition code(s) sent at the service level for AP Claim service lines.





This data should be accessed by joining to AP_CLM_PX_AMBU_CERT from AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on TX_ID and then to this table on TX_ID and LINE=GROUP_LINE. To report on claim service lines related to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), instead join through AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on TX_ID.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated ambulance certificate condition code(s) in this AP Claim procedure transaction record. Together with TX_ID, this forms the foreign key to the AP_CLM_PX_AMBU_CERT.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple ambulance certificate condition code(s) that are associated with the AP Claim procedure transaction records from the AP_CLM_PX_AMBU_CERT table.

columns.name: AMBU_CERT_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores an ambulance certificate condition code category ID.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient is confined to a bed or chair


Transportation was to the Nearest Facility


Admitted to a Hospital


Bed Confined Before the Ambulance Service


Bed Confined After the Ambulance Service


Moved by Stretcher


Unconscious or in Shock


Transported in an Emergency Situation


Physically Restrained


Visible Hemorrhaging


Ambulance Service was Medically Necessary
